entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as a person who cast an alarmed and threatening kind of look at the speaker. He is referred to by name, indicating that he is a specific individual.

entities.name: the idea
entities.description: The idea is mentioned as something that Ron and the speaker had, but later it is clarified that it was actually the speaker's idea. The idea is referred to as a singular entity.

entities.name: the speaker
entities.description: The speaker is mentioned as a person who had an idea and tried to share it with Ron. They are referred to by pronouns, but their name is not explicitly stated.

entities.name: us
entities.description: The speaker refers to themselves and possibly others as 'us', indicating a group of people.

relationships.description: Ron opposed the idea, casting an alarmed and threatening kind of look at the speaker. This is indicated by his reaction to the speaker's suggestion.
